<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Hanspur (The Water Rat)](/Deities.aspx?ID=154)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Learn how to live off the river, guard river travelers from unnatural hazards, save others from drowning

**Anathema** Impose needless laws or restrictions on others, aid daemons or the Horsemen

**Follower Alignments**
N, CG, CN, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Dexterity

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Favored Weapon** [Trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=7), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=30), [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=35), [Wealth](/Domains.aspx?ID=36)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=154)

- **3rd**
[Aqueous Orb](/Spells.aspx?ID=669)

- **4th**
[Solid Fog](/Spells.aspx?ID=290)

</column>
name: Hanspur (The Water Rat)
